projectSection.title: Personal Project
projectSection.title2: Here are a few personal projects I've worked

1.technology: Technologies: Java Spring Boot, JPA, Spring Security, OAuth2, RESTFul APIs, Swagger, Gmail Service.
1.description: Career Connect is a platform that connects businesses and candidates quickly, helping efficient recruitment and job hunting. The system allows posting job ads, creating candidate profiles, and finding matching partners in just a few steps.

2.technology: Technologies: Java Spring Boot, JPA, Spring Security, OAuth2, RESTFul API, ReactJs, Html, Css, MySQL, Swagger.
2.description: A website that allows users to purchase laptops directly. Supports user registration, shopping functionalities, online payment, and order history tracking. The administrator role enables managing customers, brands, categories, and viewing statistics.

3.technology: Technologies: Java Spring Boot, Spring Security, Thymeleaf, RESTful API, AngularJS, Bootstrap 5, Spring MVC, SQL Server
3.description: Online accessory sales platform. Includes user and admin roles with permissions. Features for adding, deleting, and editing products.
